author: ws
content:
The things you own end up owning you!

Time shares, vacation homes, motor homes, recreational vehicles, etc..These things are  all money pits..

The happiest day for most boat owners, is the day they’re rid of their vessels, and headaches..

Vladimir Putin, Now free of his yacht is dancing the hora, and tarantella..

Who’s going to pay for the care and maintenance of His  property..

This forfeiture is far from over, a judge, like King Solomon will decide who the yacht’s true owner is..

It’s going to cost someone money, and they’ll be furnishing  free berthing, and maintenance to

Vladimir Putin, Freeing up more of his resources to wage war in the Ukraine
